text:
Would like to request JMX Instrumentation for JDBC Interceptors, notably the PreferedStatementCache.

Would like to see cache hits, number of elements in cache.  I would be interested in contributing.

Please advise.

Thanks,
Jeff Schenk
creator: jeffaschenk@gmail.com

text: Do you have any patch or idea for this enhancement?
creator: kfujino@apache.org
kfujino@apache.org
text:
This fix will be in :
- 9.0.x for 9.0.5 onwards
- 8.5.x for 8.5.28 onwards
